description: Explore Gitcoin, a pioneering platform that connects developers with funding for open-source projects. Discover its features like quadratic funding, bounties, and hackathons, and see how it empowers and incentivizes the open-source community.
keywords: Gitcoin, open-source, funding, quadratic funding, bounties, grants, hackathons, developers, blockchain, Gitcoin Quests, Gitcoin Bounties, Gitcoin Grants, Gitcoin Kernel, decentralized funding, community projects
title: Understanding Gitcoin: Bridging Open-Source and Funding
